select tpc.COMM_NM comm_name, t1.COMM_ID, max_price, min_price, avg_price, count, amount from ( select tod.COMM_ID, avg(tod.PRICE) avg_price, max(tod.PRICE) max_price, min(tod.PRICE) min_price, sum(tod.COUNT) count, sum(tod.COUNT * tod.PRICE) amount from t_shop ts inner join t_order t on ts.SHOP_ID = t.SHOP_ID and ts.DISTR_ID = #{distrId} inner join t_order_d tod on tod.ORDER_ID = t.ID and t.STATE > 0 group by tod.COMM_ID ) as t1 inner join t_paf_comm tpc on t1.COMM_ID = tpc.COMM_ID
order by amount desc limit #{limit}

select tpc.COMM_NM comm_name, t1.COMM_ID, max_price, min_price, avg_price, count, amount from ( select COMM_ID, avg(PRICE) avg_price, max(PRICE) max_price, min(PRICE) min_price, sum(COUNT) count, sum(COUNT * PRICE) amount from t_order_d group by COMM_ID ) as t1 inner join t_paf_comm tpc on t1.COMM_ID = tpc.COMM_ID
